OOC: I know I should not be able to post, but I'm getting things 
under control at school. I'll control Rodimus for the time being, 
until Robo comes back.

BIC:

Slowly, Rodimus saw his love open her eyes. he walked to her side and 
gently took her hand. He stroke her beautiful face, hoping it was 
really her.

Rodimus: Nightlight? Is it you, my love?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight?
> 
> Time had passed since BlackStorm had been reprogramed to became 
> Nightlight again. She slowly was waking up inside the quarters 
where 
> Ydrassil had been locked her up, but still she was confused and 
> memories spinning as hurricanes inside her mind. Who was she? 
> BlackStorm? Nightlight? both?
